title: Data Analytics
description: I offer data analytics services to help organizations make sense of their data. I provide solutions using tools like Excel, Power BI. With skills in data analysis, visualization, and storytelling, I help businesses uncover insights and make informedÂ decisions.

title: Web Development
description: I offer custom website design, responsive development, e-commerce integration, and CMS setup. I optimize for performance, security, and SEO, ensuring your site is robust and user-friendly. I provide ongoing maintenance and support to keep your web presence strong.

title: ReactJS
description: I specialize in ReactJS development, building dynamic and responsive web applications. With a focus on component-based architecture, I create reusable and efficient code. My expertise includes integrating APIs, state management, and ensuring high performance for a seamless user experience.

title: UI/UX Designing
description: I specialize in UI/UX design, creating intuitive and visually appealing interfaces that enhance user experience. I focus on user research, prototyping, and usability testing to ensure designs meet user needs. My goal is to make your product both beautiful and functional, ensuring a seamless and engaging user experience.
